Keywords: Avengers , Fantastic Four , Jean Grey School For Higher Learning , S.H.I.E.L.D. , Weapon X , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Logan
Special Powers
THAT'S WHAT HAPPENS WHEN YOU SCUFFLE WITH THE OL' CANUCKLEHEAD: At the beginning of your turn, heal Wolverine 1 click and roll a d6. 4-6: Heal 1 click for each distinct printed team ability shared by Wolverine and all adjacent friendly characters.
YA FIGHT ME, YER GONNA GET HURT...END OF STORY: Charge, Flurry, Stealth.

Comments
April 22, 2022
Bat-Phreak
Just came across my old UXM057 Proteus, and realized this Wolvie is a disgustingly-good candidate for Possession. Protie's Burning Out Host Bodies and Wolvie's That's What Happens When You Scuffle with the Ol' Canucklehead are both "Beginning of Turn" effects, so the active player may choose to heal AFTER Logan potentially takes the unavoidable damage. Combine the Protie-Wolve with ffhx005e Forge, and for 185-pts Logan gets a 7-square Charge, 13-AV, and 6-DAM w/ Exploit Weakness. Add 35-points for Venom Mags on his lowest dial, 65-pts for Kate Pryde for PC + Lockheed's Perplex, and 15-pts for Ape Batman for Outwit, and you get a stupid-good 300-pt X-Men Themed Team that would be in the running for the Biggest Cheese Award....

KlaudyD
Yea I should have stated better. It's 1 heal but you should be playing this man with a buddy beside him to get that 2 at least or more at least. There's plenty of people that can support him and be a butt buddy for this Logan to get his heals off. If played right you should at least be healing for 2 (counting that you land the roll also)
December 17, 2021
andremsal
I think you guys read something wrong. He has a 100% 1 click heal AND you have 50% chance of healing 1-3 depending on the other teams adjacent. That said it is not a minimum heal of 2, it is a minimum heal of 1 with chance to get a +1, +2 or +3 heal.

December 8, 2021
Goop
Flurry, Blades and exploit is always a great combination. He does have a lot of toughness so he's pretty reliant on hitting those big 4-6 heals. You could put two of him next to each other and be healing for 3 pretty often. He's good but the other wolverines in this set i think are better and dont require as much set up.
